summary: adds serpentine  dragons to vanilla skyrims leveled lists
descriptionHtml:
adds serpentine  dragons to vanilla skyrims dragon spawn leveled lists since while digging through the dlc files in the creation kit i noticed they only appear on solstheim

requires dragonborn and they spawn at lv55+ 

also note if you use deadly dragons or any other mod/dlc that edits dragon level lists you will need to make a bash patch in wrye bash
author: kharnzarro
